scripts.report:allure: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open  allure-report
scripts.test: npm run limpiar-reporte && npm run ejecutar-pruebas && npm run generar-reporte && npm run abrir-reporte
scripts.test1: npm run limpiar-reporte && npx cypress run ejecutar-pruebas
scripts.allure:run: rimraf allure-results && rimraf allure-report && cypress run || true && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
